text: John Joseph Creedon (August 1, 1924 â€“ October 11, 2020) was an American businessman. He was the President and Chief Executive Officer of Metropolitan Life Insurance Company from 1983 to 1989. Creedon was born in New York City. Creedon died on October 11, 2020 in Larchmont, New York at the age of 96.John J.
